FoodTruck.FirstMail: Hey farmer @!^I've been driving my food truck around for a while now but have recently discovered Pelican Town - it is such a beautiful place!^I've spoken with the Mayor and I have been given permission to set up my truck in Town each Monday and Thursday.^Hope to see you soon for some delicious meals!^^-Chef Elm.[#]Pelican Town Food Truck
FoodTruck.Dialogue01: I have only the finest quality foods!
